scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/gradial-playground/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/gradial-65
  set jcr:title{String} to "Gradial Playground"
end

ensure principal ACL for oauthservice
  allow jcr:read,jcr:versionManagement,rep:write,jcr:lockManagement,crx:replicate,jcr:readAccessControl,jcr:modifyAccessControl on /content
  allow jcr:read,jcr:versionManagement,rep:write,jcr:lockManagement,crx:replicate,jcr:readAccessControl,jcr:modifyAccessControl on /conf
  allow jcr:read on /apps
  allow jcr:read on /libs
  allow jcr:read on /etc
  allow jcr:read on /var
end
